alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 1:46PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southerly and then eventually northwesterly winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Isolated wind gusts to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Through afternoon Wednesday, winds across the area will be southerly. Through the evening hours, winds will turn more westerly, then northwesterly, as a cold front passes through the area. The strongest winds are expected to be out of both the south and northwest.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
